verses.verse: THE LORD reigns; let the people tremble; he sits upon the cherubim; let the earth be moved.
The LORD is great in Zion; he is high above all the people.
Let them praise thy great and honored name; for it is holy.
The king's might also loves judgment; thou dost establish equity, thou executest judgment and righteousness in Jacob.
Exalt the LORD our God, and worship at his footstool; for he is holy.
Moses and Aaron were among his priests, and Samuel among them that call upon his name; they called upon the LORD, and he answered them.
He spoke to them in the cloudy pillar; they kept his testimonies and the covenant that he gave them.
Thou didst answer them, O LORD our God; thou wast an avenger for them. O God, reward them according to their works.
Exalt the LORD our God, and worship at his holy mountain; for the LORD our God is holy.
